DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: Django's secret key for cryptographic signing

APNS_CERTIFICATE.description: The contents of your APNS SSL certificate in .pem format. Make sure the certificate used (sandbox or prouction) is appropriate for the value of `APNS_USE_SANDBOX`.

APNS_USE_SANDBOX.description: Whether to use the APNS Sandbox (True) or Production (False) endpoints

GCM_API_KEY.description: Your Google Cloud Messaging API Key

XMPP_PUSH_SERVICE.description: The address of the XMPP Push Service or PubSub Node (as defined in XEP-0357) that will act as this application's gateway to the XMPP ecosystem.
